timeline.bodyText: TEN_MIN_IN_SECONDS_STR can be a constant in this class itself.  But this is not important.
timeline.author: Ethanlm

replies.bodyText: I was going to use MultiCountStat.TEN_MIN_IN_SECONDS_STR to replace the one in StatsUtil, which is in storm-server for more general usage, but didn't replace the other usages to keep a smaller review.
replies.author: agresch

replies.bodyText: There is another similar class MultiLatencyStat. It doesn't feel right to use MultiCountStat.TEN_MIN_IN_SECONDS_STR for MultiLatencyStat. But this is just personal preference and we can leave this to the future. I am okay with current change.
replies.author: Ethanlm
